Name: amowner
column6: user id of the owner (currently not used)

Name: amstrategies
column6: number of operator strategies for this access method

Name: amsupport
column6: number of support routines for this access method

Name: amorderstrategy
column6: zero if the index offers no sort order, otherwise the strategy number of the strategy operator that describes the sort order

Name: amindexnulls
column6: does am support null index entries?
